zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理阶段]
zh.content:
当前，雪崩币(AVAX)在12.0312美元附近震荡整理，24小时变化较小，显示出市场的犹豫与不确定性。从高点12.1053美元和低点12.0212美元来看，AVAX在这个价格区间内波动，短期内可能面临进一步的横盘整理。

技术指标方面，虽然RSI数据缺失，但MACD为-0.0708，表明短期内卖方力量略强，可能导致价格下行。20日简单移动平均线(SMA)为12.2374，若价格持续低于该水平，可能暗示进一步的下行压力。

支撑位方面，12.0212美元是一个关键支撑位，若跌破此水平，可能引发更大的抛售压力。相反，12.1053美元为重要阻力位，若能突破，则有望恢复上涨趋势。投资者应密切关注这些关键价位，以制定相应策略。

综合来看，建议投资者在当前震荡行情中保持谨慎，等待价格突破关键支撑或阻力位后再做决策。短期内，考虑适度参与，止损设置应在12.0212美元下方，以控制风险。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at $12.0312, reflecting a slight decline of 0.19% over the past 24 hours. The price action has formed a narrow trading range between the high of $12.1053 and the low of $12.0212, indicating a period of consolidation. This sideways movement suggests indecision among traders, with the market awaiting a catalyst to break out of this range. Monitoring volume during this phase will be crucial, as an increase could signal a potential breakout.

The 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) is positioned at $12.23740, acting as a key resistance level. If the price can surpass this threshold, it may attract bullish momentum and push towards higher levels. Conversely, the recent low of $12.0212 may serve as a critical support area. A breach below this level could lead to increased selling pressure, potentially testing further downside towards $11.80 or lower, depending on market sentiment.

The Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) is currently at -0.070842400, indicating bearish momentum. Although the signal line is not available, a negative MACD suggests that sellers are currently in control. Traders should keep an eye on potential bullish divergence, which could indicate a reversal if the price holds above support while the MACD shows upward momentum.

In the current market environment, it may be prudent for traders to adopt a cautious approach. Those looking to enter long positions might consider waiting for a confirmed breakout above the 20-day SMA. On the other hand, short sellers could find opportunities if the price decisively breaks below the recent low of $12.0212. As always, risk management strategies should be implemented to mitigate potential losses in a volatile market.
